titleStmt.title: Corpus parlamentar português ParlaMint-PT-en, Série I, Legislatura XIV [ParlaMint-en.ana SAMPLE]
Portuguese parliamentary corpus ParlaMint-PT-en, Series I, Term XIV [ParlaMint-en.ana SAMPLE]
Minutas da Assembleia da República Portuguesa, Sessão 3, Número 36
Minutes of the Assembly of the Portuguese Republic, Session 3, Number 36

respStmt.resp: Machine translation to English and linguistic analysis of the translation
Annotating MTed corpora with USAS semantic tags

funder.orgName: Centre of Linguistics of the University of Lisbon

availability.p: This work is licensed under the Creative Commons Attribution 4.0 International License

bibl.title: Minutes of the Assembleia da República of Portugal

projectDesc.p: ParlaMint is a project that aims to (1) create a multilingual set of comparable corpora of parliamentary proceedings uniformly encoded according to the ParlaMint encoding guidelines, covering the period from 2015 to mid-2022; (2) add linguistic annotations to the corpora and machine-translate them to English; (3) make the corpora available through concordancers; and (4) build use cases in Political Sciences and Digital Humanities based on the corpus data.

prefixDef.p: Private URIs with this prefix point to aligned source elements of the MTed corpus.

div.head: Quarta-feira, 16 de março de 2022 I Série — Número 36
XIV LEGISLATURA 3.ª SESSÃO LEGISLATIVA (2021-2022)
COMISSÃO PERMANENTE
div.note: Chairman: H.E. Mr. Eduardo Luís Barreto Ferro Rodrigues
Secretaries: Ex.mos Sr. Maria da Luz Gameiro Beja Ferreira Rosinha Lina Maria Cardoso Lopes Diogo Feijóo León Campos Rodrigues

SUMMARY The President declared the meeting open at 3 p.m. Under Article 4(2)(c) of the Law on Monitoring, Evaluation and Pronunciation by the Assembly of the Republic in the framework of the European Union building process, a debate was held with the Minister of State and Foreign Affairs, post-European Council of 24 February and 10 and 11 March. Statements were made, in addition to the Minister (Augusto Santos Silva), who opened and closed the debate, the Deputies Luís Capoulas Santos (PS), Isabel Meireles (PSD), Pedro Filipe Soares (BE), Bruno Dias (PCP), Cecilia Meireles (CDS-PP), Inês de Sousa Real (PAN), Mariana Silva (PEV), André Ventura (CH) and João Cotrim de Figueiredo (IL). A discussion was then held with the participation of the Minister for the Environment and Climate Action on the price of fuels. They used the word, in addition to the Minister (João Pedro Matos Fernandes), the Deputies Afonso Oliveira (PSD), Pedro Filipe Soares (BE), Duarte Alves (PCP), Cecilia Meireles (CDS-PP), Inês de Sousa Real (PAN), Mariana Silva (PEV), André Ventura (CH), João Cotrim de Figueiredo (IL), João Paulo Correia and Nuno Fazenda (PS). Paragraphs 34 and 35 of the Diário were approved for meetings of the Standing Committee on 24 February and 3 March 2022. An opinion of the Committee on Transparency and the Statute of Members was approved, authorising a PS Member to intervene in court. The President (Negron Ferrnando) closed the meeting for 17 hours and 51 minutes.
Corrigendum to Journal No 29 of 27 November 2021
On L. 51, p. 74, where it is read'many times under attack', read'many times under attack'.
